Posts.Title: Referral to Breast Clinic Denisewoo Kicks

Posts.Content: Denisewoo wrote: I am 47 have not had a menstral cycle since I was 41 and my maternal grandmother passed away from bc at 49. I recently was in the er for excruciating pain, 12/10, in my right breast. I was given blood and urine tests, as well as a chest X-ray to check for kidney stones, blood clots or lung infection. I was also given a ct and 2 shots of hydromorphine for pain. After about 5 hrs I was sent for another ct with an iv dye. The dr finally came in said I had no stones, blood clots it lung infection. But the radiologist notice a lump on my breast, so dr gave me a physical exam of both breasts, then said he needed to confere with radiologist again. Dr came back after about 15 min and said he was referring me to the breast clinic. I'm still in pain and now I'm a little worried as to what this all means. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Referred to breast clinic Denisewoo Chachas_mommy

Posts.Content: Nov 19, 2016 10:15PM Denisewoo wrote: I am waiting to hear back from breast clinic, this all just happened Friday morning. No genetic testing has been done in my family. Should that be something I should do?
Posts.Title: Referred to breast clinic Denisewoo Chachas_mommy
